product_name: White Sierra Trabagon Rain Pants - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: These lightweight Trabagon rain pants from White Sierra will keep you dry and comfortable on the trail. Micro ripstop polyester is waterproof and breathable; seams are fully taped for added protection. Back pocket secures small items with rip-and-stick closure. Reflective logo provides visibility in low light. Snap closures on lower legs allow pants to be tightened around footwear. Special buy.
short_description: These lightweight Trabagon rain pants from White Sierra will keep you dry and comfortable on the trail.
